# General merchant details

## What is the name of the merchant / online shop?

_e.g. `Zalando`_

## Is this merchant / shop also known under a different name? If so, please add the aliases here

_e.g. `Prime` for Amazon_

## What is the website for the shop? If the shop operates in multiple countries, try to use one with a `.com` domain. If that is not possible, try to use the domain from the country, where the shop mostly operates in.

_e.g. `https://myshop.com`_

## What is the logo for the merchant / shop. If possible, use a square logo. Have a look at [Brandfetch](https://brandfetch.com) for logos.

_paste image here_

## In which category does the merchant / shop operates in?

- [ ] Fashion
- [ ] Electronics
- [ ] Food delivery
- [ ] Groceries
- [ ] Travel
- [ ] Entertainment
- [ ] Services
- [ ] Other

## In which countries does the merchant / shop operate (only for private customers, not for commercial customers). Please add them as a comma separated 2-digit country code list.

_e.g. `DE,FR`_
